data.text:
On a day off while taking a walk, I bumped in to 
Narita Top Road. She seemed excited about something.
data.processed:
󠁿On a day off while taking a walk, I bumped in to 
󠁿Narita Top Road. She seemed excited about something.

data.text:
Looks like the time to get from the dorm to the 
station is fine! Looks like there will be plenty 
of time. ――Right, let's head to the station.
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: Heading somewhere?

data.processed:
󠁿Looks like the time to get from the dorm to the 
󠁿station is fine! Looks like there will be plenty 
󠁿of time. ――Right, let's head to the station.

data.text:
Trainer-san! Yeah, I was planning on going to the amusement park! 
……Though today is just a trial run.
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: A trial run for the amusement park……?
choices.processed: <size=42>A trial run for the amusement park……?</size>

data.processed:
󠁿Trainer-san! Yeah, I was planning on going to the amusement park! 
󠁿……Though today is just a trial run.

data.text:
Next time, I was planning on going with some friends, 
and I was put in charge of this. So I was thinking 
of getting a preview and preparing for it!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Next time, I was planning on going with some friends, 
󠁿and I was put in charge of this. So I was thinking 
󠁿of getting a preview and preparing for it!

data.text:
She said it matter-of-factly……but it was probably 
rough to do this alone. That said, if I told her 
I wanted to help, she'd probably decline――

choices.text: Sounds fun. Mind if I tag along today?
choices.processed: <size=43>Sounds fun. Mind if I tag along today?</size>

choices.text: Sounds fun. Mind if I tag along today?
choices.processed: <size=43>Sounds fun. Mind if I tag along today?</size>

data.processed:
󠁿She said it matter-of-factly……but it was probably 
󠁿rough to do this alone. That said, if I told her 
󠁿I wanted to help, she'd probably decline――

data.text:
With Trainer-san? ……Ah, sorta like a change of pace? 
But, if you go with me, you won't be able to see much――
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: But it'll be more fun!
But it'll be more fun!

data.processed:
󠁿With Trainer-san? ……Ah, sorta like a change of pace? 
󠁿But, if you go with me, you won't be able to see much――

data.text:
Fufuu, you're right! If I looked around with Trainer-san 
I could spend the whole day having fun! Let's go together!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Fufuu, you're right! If I looked around with Trainer-san 
󠁿I could spend the whole day having fun! Let's go together!

data.text:
Well then, what I wanted to check out today was…… 
the schedule for the attractions and how crowded it 
would be. I'll use that to plan for the day itself.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Well then, what I wanted to check out today was…… 
󠁿the schedule for the attractions and how crowded it 
󠁿would be. I'll use that to plan for the day itself.

data.text:
Everyone's looking forward to the parade, so we'll 
definitely have to check that out. I'll have to 
create a course that takes the parade in to account.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Everyone's looking forward to the parade, so we'll 
󠁿definitely have to check that out. I'll have to 
󠁿create a course that takes the parade in to account.

data.text:
……Okaaay, the parade times are……the first one is at 11:30. Which 
means we won't be able to line up for other attractions, huh……
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿……Okaaay, the parade times are……the first one is at 11:30. Which 
󠁿means we won't be able to line up for other attractions, huh……

data.text: So maybe souvenirs first……but, then we have to carry them around.
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: How about having an early lunch?

data.processed: 󠁿So maybe souvenirs first……but, then we have to carry them around.

data.text:
The parade ended just around lunch time. Around that 
time, the restaurants would start to get crowded and 
the lines for the popular attractions might die down.
data.processed:
󠁿The parade ended just around lunch time. Around that 
󠁿time, the restaurants would start to get crowded and 
󠁿the lines for the popular attractions might die down.

data.text:
Ah, I see……! By doing that, we can avoid the crowds 
for lunch and the attractions! Looks like it'll 
be easier to get on the popular attractions, too!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, I see……! By doing that, we can avoid the crowds 
󠁿for lunch and the attractions! Looks like it'll 
󠁿be easier to get on the popular attractions, too!

data.text:
Then, next up……we need to find a restaurant for lunch, right!? 
I'll need to keep a few of the places in mind!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Then, next up……we need to find a restaurant for lunch, right!? 
󠁿I'll need to keep a few of the places in mind!

data.text:
This shop looks good! You can see the parade course 
from the window, so you can see how crowded it will be!
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: A seat near the exit might be best

data.processed:
󠁿This shop looks good! You can see the parade course 
󠁿from the window, so you can see how crowded it will be!

data.text:
You're right, if possible I want to see if we can request seats. 
Now, let's order something and see how long it takes!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿You're right, if possible I want to see if we can request seats. 
󠁿Now, let's order something and see how long it takes!

data.text:
Mmm~, it's tasty……! But, that was unexpected. 
To think I'd have trouble deciding after looking at the menu!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Mmm~, it's tasty……! But, that was unexpected. 
󠁿To think I'd have trouble deciding after looking at the menu!

data.text:
I was still having a hard time deciding, even 
after Trainer-san had already ordered. Looks 
like I need to consider how long it'll take to decide.
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: Want a bite?

data.processed:
󠁿I was still having a hard time deciding, even 
󠁿after Trainer-san had already ordered. Looks 
󠁿like I need to consider how long it'll take to decide.

data.text:
I hadn't touched it yet, so I took my knife 
and cut a piece off, putting it on her plate.
data.processed:
󠁿I hadn't touched it yet, so I took my knife 
󠁿and cut a piece off, putting it on her plate.

data.text:
! Thanks alot! I see, sharing……! If we did that, then we wouldn't 
have to worry over what to order. Fufu, it sounds like a lot of fun!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿! Thanks alot! I see, sharing……! If we did that, then we wouldn't 
󠁿have to worry over what to order. Fufu, it sounds like a lot of fun!

data.text:
Alright, looks like we've found a good spot! 
There's nothing blocking the view here!
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: There might be more space over there
choices.processed: <size=43>There might be more space over there</size>

data.processed:
󠁿Alright, looks like we've found a good spot! 
󠁿There's nothing blocking the view here!

data.text:
That's true……looks like there's plenty of space over there. 
That might be a good spot too……――Ah! The parade's here!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿That's true……looks like there's plenty of space over there. 
󠁿That might be a good spot too……――Ah! The parade's here!

data.text:
Waaa! At the front is the Carrot Queen! 
Her outfit's really cute! The float looks really grand too……!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Waaa! At the front is the Carrot Queen! 
󠁿Her outfit's really cute! The float looks really grand too……!

data.text:
The dancers and the music are really sparkly too…… 
Ah, looks like you can participate in the dance too!
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: Let's try it out!

data.processed:
󠁿The dancers and the music are really sparkly too…… 
󠁿Ah, looks like you can participate in the dance too!

data.text: Yeah!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah!

data.text:
'Round and 'round and 'round……fufuu! 
Seeing Trainer-san dancing is pretty unusual! Fufufu!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿'Round and 'round and 'round……fufuu! 
󠁿Seeing Trainer-san dancing is pretty unusual! Fufufu!

data.text:
We enjoyed the parade to its fullest. Right after that, we went 
to the most popular attraction in the park, the Jet Coaster.
data.processed:
󠁿We enjoyed the parade to its fullest. Right after that, we went 
󠁿to the most popular attraction in the park, the Jet Coaster.

data.text:
Even the Jet Coaster is crowded during lunch since 
it's so popular, huh. ――Yeah, I guess that means 
after the parade is the Big Thunder Mountain!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Even the Jet Coaster is crowded during lunch since 
󠁿it's so popular, huh. ――Yeah, I guess that means 
󠁿after the parade is the Big Thunder Mountain!

data.text:
One of my classmates said that it's easy to get 『Motion Sick』 on it so 
……I thought it might be better to check it out beforehand!
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: Alright, let's go!

data.processed:
󠁿One of my classmates said that it's easy to get 『Motion Sick』 on it so 
󠁿……I thought it might be better to check it out beforehand!

data.text:
Wa, wa, wa, wa-……! 
L-look at that, the people down there are waving……H-heeeey! Haha……
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Wa, wa, wa, wa-……! 
󠁿L-look at that, the people down there are waving……H-heeeey! Haha……

data.text: Hii-, wai-……iyaaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: 󠁿Hii-, wai-……iyaaaaaaaaa!!

data.text:
……S-sorry, it wasn't supposed to be like this…… 
Ugghh……
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: Are you okay? We can rest over at――
choices.processed: <size=43>Are you okay? We can rest over at――</size>

data.processed:
󠁿……S-sorry, it wasn't supposed to be like this…… 
󠁿Ugghh……

data.text:
I open the park map and try to find a place to take a 
break. Looks like there are some benches around the 
nearby pond. I supported her as we made our way there.
data.processed:
󠁿I open the park map and try to find a place to take a 
󠁿break. Looks like there are some benches around the 
󠁿nearby pond. I supported her as we made our way there.

data.text: …………Huuu……
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: Feeling better?

data.text:
Yeah, thanks to you. 
I'm sorry for bothering you.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah, thanks to you. 
󠁿I'm sorry for bothering you.

data.text:
………… 
……Trainer-san, um……
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿………… 
󠁿……Trainer-san, um……

data.text: Are you having fun?
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: Eh?

data.processed: 󠁿Are you having fun?

data.text:
I mean, ever since this morning, you've spent all day 
with me……I was thinking it would be a good change of 
pace. But, you haven't really been having fun right?
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: It's fun because I'm with you
It's fun because I'm with you

data.processed:
󠁿I mean, ever since this morning, you've spent all day 
󠁿with me……I was thinking it would be a good change of 
󠁿pace. But, you haven't really been having fun right?

data.text:
But, I've just been one-sidedly having you help me. 
Am I not being a bother……?
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: No. ――Is it a burden for you?
No. ――Is it a burden for you?

data.processed:
󠁿But, I've just been one-sidedly having you help me. 
󠁿Am I not being a bother……?

data.text:
Not even a little bit! 
As the one in charge, I decided to do this myself!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Not even a little bit! 
󠁿As the one in charge, I decided to do this myself!

data.text:
Because I want everyone to enjoy it to the fullest! 
That makes it worth doing! It's something I, myself, want to do!
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: It's the same for me

data.processed:
󠁿Because I want everyone to enjoy it to the fullest! 
󠁿That makes it worth doing! It's something I, myself, want to do!

data.text: ……The same?
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: 󠁿……The same?

data.text:
Being able to devote yourself to someone else. And on top 
of that, feeling that it's worth doing. I tell Narita Top Road 
that I think she's amazing to be able to feel like that.
data.processed:
󠁿Being able to devote yourself to someone else. And on top 
󠁿of that, feeling that it's worth doing. I tell Narita Top Road 
󠁿that I think she's amazing to be able to feel like that.

data.text:
That's why I wanted her to see it through. I wanted 
her to live up to everyone's expectations. But, 
if it was hard for her to do it alone then――

choices.text: Don't hesitate to rely on me
Don't hesitate to rely on me

data.processed:
󠁿That's why I wanted her to see it through. I wanted 
󠁿her to live up to everyone's expectations. But, 
󠁿if it was hard for her to do it alone then――

choices.text: Things'll go smoother with both of us, right?
choices.processed: <size=37>Things'll go smoother with both of us, right?</size>

choices.text: Things'll go smoother with both of us, right?
choices.processed: <size=37>Things'll go smoother with both of us, right?</size>

data.text: With both of us…………Ah.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: 󠁿With both of us…………Ah.

data.text:
(……That's right. More so than by myself. 
With two of us, we'll be able come up with better ideas……!)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿(……That's right. More so than by myself. 
󠁿With two of us, we'll be able come up with better ideas……!)

data.text:
(So we can make this as fun as we can for everyone. 
――It's fine to borrow someone else's strength!)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿(So we can make this as fun as we can for everyone. 
󠁿――It's fine to borrow someone else's strength!)

data.text: ……Then if Trainer-san is saying that.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: 󠁿……Then if Trainer-san is saying that.

data.text: Can I ask you to continue accompanying me?
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: Gladly!

data.processed: 󠁿Can I ask you to continue accompanying me?

data.text:
Thank you very much! 
Well then, next up……let's go to the Haunted Halls!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Thank you very much! 
󠁿Well then, next up……let's go to the Haunted Halls!

data.text:
I followed after Narita Top Road who had a 
bright and cheerful smile on her face. The time 
we spent brainstorming ideas was very productive.
data.processed:
󠁿I followed after Narita Top Road who had a 
󠁿bright and cheerful smile on her face. The time 
󠁿we spent brainstorming ideas was very productive.
